data.content: Implemented tracker detection and backend auto-routing foundation. Added explicit precedence field to memory manager model (knots=0 > beads=1), per-repo type caching in AutoRoutingBackend with 30s TTL and clearRepoCache(), capabilitiesForRepo() API on backend-instance, extracted shared MemoryManagerBadge component, fixed directory browser label consistency, added doctor checks for CLI availability per tracker type and registry consistency validation. All 895 tests pass, lint clean, typecheck clean. Commit: ba61bf0
